lines.gurmukhi: auqm miDm Aru ADm qiRibiD jgu Awpno suAMnu kwhU buro qau n lwig hY
lines.transliteration_english: Outam Madhim Aru Adham Tribidhi Jagu , Aapano Suannu Kaahoo Buro Tau N Laagi Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as no category of society, high, middle or low class considers their son bad or evil,

lines.gurmukhi: sB koaU bnju krq lwB lBq kau Awpno ibauhwru Blo jwin Anrwig hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sabh Kooo Banaju Karat Laabh Labhat Kau , Aapano Biuhaaru Bhalo Jaani Anaraagi Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as everyone do business in order to earn profit, but they all consider their own profession to be the best and therefore love it,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy Apny Apny iestY cwhq sBY Apny phry sB jgqu sujwig hY
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Apanay Apanay Isatai Chaahat Sabhai , Apanay Paharay Sabh Jagatu Sujaagi Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly everyone respect and love their own deity and in their life-time, are ever ready and conscious of worshipping him,

lines.gurmukhi: suAMnu smrQ Bey bnju ibkwny jwnY iest pRqwpu AMiqkwil AgRBwig hY ]552]
lines.transliteration_english: Suannu Samarad Bhaay Banaju Bikaanay Jaanai , Isat Prataapu Antikaali Agrabhaagi Hai ?552?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a son when grown up understands the art of business and trading and acquires proficiency, similarly on receiving initiation from the True Guru, a devoted disciple learns that the knowledge, ambrosial name blessed by the True Guru is capable of lib
